Buyer Services


Buyer Services provides assistance to buyers in English, Spanish, Arabic, Russian,French, German, Polish and Chinese. They help with registration, bidding, payment (accept wire transfers and process payments), vehicle pick up, etc. They will answer your questions about buyer rules, auction policies and all web and mobile application issues. Contact Buyer Services via Phone, e-mail or Live Chat.


Phone

USA Toll Free & Canada:

877-937-4243


International

T 630-686-4097

F Fax: 630-382-5628


México - (Teléfono gratuito)

001-855-615-9401


Polska – (Bezpłatny)

0-0-800-121-4897


(الإمارات العربية المتحدة - (الرقم المجاني

8000-3-570-3114


Email

cservice@iaai.com 


Hours

Mon-Fri 6:30am - 7pm (CT)

Sat 8am - 5pm (CT)

Sun Closed


Address

701 Harger Road, Suite 201,

Oak Brook, IL 60523
